channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Bob Marley & The Wailers

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Lively Up Yourself - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Lively Up Yourself performed by Bob Marley & The Wailers. Chords used in the song: C, F.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Exodus - Key of Am - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Exodus performed by Bob Marley & The Wailers. Chords used in the song: Am.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Redemption Song - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Redemption Song performed by Bob Marley & The Wailers. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Three Little Birds - Key of A - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Three Little Birds performed by Bob Marley & The Wailers. Chords used in the song: A, D, E7.
